data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=C7LrS3h185QQ7kNvgGQ3tXS&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBdrvRQufT8oeaVwQZgY3DeIZBw7l-DTPaKMuPCv43ePA&oe=670515B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0X9nBgBEai8Q7kNvgFt081X&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYApL0yEYjECqZtb1doKjq2vldQIJmmfpXqcvceJfrJ0HA&oe=67052352)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=I7PVxMGpp_oQ7kNvgGZIt5v&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC0fipBeWisIKL2pFLFhqO4m2fL_OIz61jLRucustrKhg&oe=67050E89)
